scripts.install:services: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:collab-service && npm run install:matching-service && npm run install:question-service && npm run install:user-service
scripts.cleanup:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker volume prune -f
scripts.cleanup:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker volume prune -f
scripts.restart:dev: npm run stop:dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.restart:prod: npm run stop:prod && npm run start:prod
